name: Trouble Hunter Chronicles: The Stolen Creed
storyline:
The game places you in the shoes of an ex OSS operative who is in France after the second World War. As you are approached by an unknown woman a mission is put in front of you - find your friend.

The game quickly pits you agains problems, puzzles, a mysterious plot, crazy Frenchmen and people trying to kill you!
summary: Explore mid 20th century Europe as an ex-OSS operative using quick wits, problem solving abilities and gritty charm to duck and weave his way between cultists, crazy Frenchmen and dangerous killers! Based on point & click classics, Trouble Hunter Chronicles revitalizes the genre for the modern era.
